LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.Name: Romance Tweaks
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifier.Desc: Multiplier applied to the chance for ALL romantic interactions
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierSingl: Multiplier applied to the chance for romantic interactions when both pawns are single
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierCheat: Multiplier applied to the chance for romantic interactions when one (or both) pawns are in a relationship with a different pawn
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceChanceModifierFacti: Multiplier applied to the chance for romantic interactions when the pawns belong to a different faction
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.RomanceSuccessModifier.Des: Success chance multiplier applied to all romantic interactions
LanguageData.RomanceTweaks.BreakupChanceModifier.Desc: Breakup chance multiplier for existing relationships
